title: Intermediate Mobile-Based Social Studies e-Learning Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening the capacity to design efficient online social studies learning in environments where content is accessible only via smartphones, cultivating the ability to apply practical educational settings through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can create design documents for six or more microlearning modules suitable for mobile environments
Learners can establish a learning effectiveness evaluation system using mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative)
Learners can produce three types of interactive digital learning materials (quizzes, infographics, scenarios) for social studies subjects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
